branchCategory.name: CA2-Z, Double Acting Single Rod, Stroke Option
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC's series CA2 with stroke options is a light weight tie rod air cylinder.  The CA2 can be ordered with rod end or rear pivot brackets. A variety of auto switches are available for mounting, including compact switches and magnetic field resistant switches. The CA2 is available in 40, 50, 63, 80 and 100 bores sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>
